channel.title: Root Materials
channel.description:
# Root Materials
![image|500x500, 100%](upload://xaxWtqradlrW5CH3VAeRBoiyqtH.jpeg)
> Root Materials is a collection of 200 unique 3D renders of the Radix symbol inspired by the first ever Radix NFT. >There is no intentional rarity, although there are some techniques or elements you may see more frequently and some only once such as generative styles, hairs, particles, metals, and emitters and bump/displacement affected materials. There are some Easter Eggs and sets distributed throughout too! **Price of each NFT**: 250 XRD **Links**: * [Website](https://www.rootmaterials.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rootmaterials) * [Creators Telegram](https://t.me/kazeracc)

item.title: Root Materials
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Root Materials

Root Materials is a collection of 200 unique 3D renders of the Radix symbol inspired by the first ever Radix NFT.

There is no intentional rarity, although there are some techniques or elements you may see more frequently and some only once such as generative styles, hairs, particles, metals, and emitters and bump/displacement affected materials. There are some Easter Eggs and sets distributed throughout too!

Price of each NFT: 250 XRD

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Creators Telegram

Read full topic
